mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_RS_INTERVIEWERS (id, NAME, sex, graduate_school, major, nation, post, education, graduation_time, person_salary, JOB, term, creator, create_time, create_dept, valid_flag) VALUES (FUNC_GET_UUID, '${name}', '${sex}', '${graduateSchool}', '${major}', '${nation}', '${post}', '${education}', to_date('${graduationTime}', 'yyyy-mm-dd'), '${personSalary}', '${job}', '${term}', '${creator}', sysdate, '${createDept}', '1')
mapper.select: select id, name name, sex sex, graduate_school graduateSchool, major major, nation nation, post post, education education, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(sex,'XB') sexShow, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(nation,'MZ') nationShow, FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(education,'XL') educationShow, to_char(graduation_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') graduationTime, person_salary personSalary, job job, term term from T_RS_INTERVIEWERS WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #{id} ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE T_RS_INTERVIEWERS SET name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, graduate_school = #{graduateSchool}, major = #{major}, nation = #{nation}, post = #{post}, education = #{education}, graduation_time = to_date(#{graduationTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd'), person_salary = #{person_salary}, job = #{job}, term = #{term}, change_dept = #{changeDept}, change_time = sysdate WHERE id = #{id}
